name: K+K Hotel Central

reviews.text: This hotel rocked. I was impressed by the helpfulness of the staff and the beautiful rooms. Our room was huge by European standards. The breakfast was great-- who can complain about champange to start the day. I travel a lot for business and was very impressed by this hotel. The free internet with computers in the lobby was very helpful. Great location as well. Loved the city-- getting lost around St. Charles Bridge was the best. The restaurant across the street was great-- good tip from previous travelers. The food was excellent and the price were great. I would highly recommend this hotel and Prague.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel K & K Central is an attractive, modern hotel within walking distance of most of the major sights. Our room was very clean, of decent size, with a king-sized bed, flat screen TV, in-room safe & plenty of space for our clothes. There was a coffee/tea maker in the room as well as an honor bar. There is free internet connection. In the lobby you will find free computers, newspapers, coffee, tea & fruit.
reviews.title: Beautiful Inside & Outside!
Still fantasic! Great hotel near all the main attractions
reviews.text: The granite counter in the bathroom had ample space for all our toiletries & there were several glass shelves as well. There was a shower/tub combination. Shampoo, bath gel, soap & hair dryer were provided.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An iron/board was delivered on request as was an anti-slip bath mat that was needed since the tub was slippery.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel nicely renovated in good location

likes.disliked: — there was a lot of renovation in the street it was down

reviews.text: The breakfast room was bright, inviting & had ample juices, tea & coffee, hot & cold meats/cheeses, scrambled & hard boiled eggs, pastries, breads & more. The staff was very nice & kept the buffet restocked as needed. Breakfast was served Mon - Thurs 6:30 - 11:00 am & Fri - Sun 6:30 - 12:00 Noon. All the common areas of this hotel are nicely decorated & inviting.
reviews.title: Modern, new, comfortable, and great location

reviews.text: Believe the hype....visited the joint over Thanksgiving, got a 4 day average rate of $ 100US...jackpot! 15 minutes walking distance to the Charles Bridge about 10 to Wenseclas Square and Old Town....staff all speak English well, breakfast spread was great and my bathroom was immaculate. One of the bellman arranged for a private car for my return trip to the airport. Oh yeah, if you're a single guy, you'll never want to leave Prague.......
reviews.title: Affirmation of the Rest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the K&K Central Hotel in November 2007, for 3 nights. We made the booking directly with the hotel following reviews from this website and we were not disappointed.
reviews.title: A Brilliant Find!

likes.liked: — Donuts and Sparkling Wine for breakfast!
likes.disliked: — No view out of the window but I'm only saying that as I can't think of anything else!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great. Its tucked down a little road which is within walking distrance of the metro, plus all major sights. From the outside the hotel looks very traditional - and don't let the building work and scaffolding next door put you off as it didn't disturb us. Inside the hotel has been completely refurbished within the last couple of years and has a very modern feel.
reviews.title: The only hotel in Prague we know is propably the best also

reviews.text: Our room was a little small however it was perfectly adequate and well appointed. A large comfortable bed, tv & remote, mini bar and tea/coffee making facilities, bathroom with shower, plenty of storage space.
reviews.title: Very Good Location and Good Hotel

likes.liked: — very clean, smart and in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast which was included was fantastic. There was a full range of fruit, yoghurt, meat, cheese, egg, bacon etc., plus bread and rolls. Also plentiful supplies of tea, coffee, fruit juice and sparkling wine! Not an experienced to be rushed.
reviews.title: Art Noveau hotel

reviews.text: Beautiful restored building in a quiet street but very close to the train station and Republic Square. Short walk to most major sights. Staff were very friendly & helpful although as it was peak season I occassionally had to wait in line for assistance. Clean, spacious room with every possible amenity (including very good black-out curtains). Free internet available in the lobby. Breakfast room was stunning and the food was very high quality including great extras like custard doughnuts and even champagne! Staying at this hotel was a blissful experience and well worth the money.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This small hotel was perfect. It is a rennovated art nouveau treasure near the opera house in Prague. Everything in the old area of Prague is a walk away. The service was first class and the rooms were nice and immaculate. A breakfast buffet came with the room. The food was very good with a nice variety. I would definately stay here again..
reviews.title: Wonderful boutique hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: K&K is beautiful hotel located in Central Prague within easy walking distance of everything. We were extremely pleased with this hotel. The room was modern Euro-deisgn with and everything was in great working order.
reviews.title: K&K Hotel in Prague -- can't imagine finding better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff spoke excellent English and were really accomodating. Wonderful breakfast was included.
reviews.title: Superb

likes.disliked: — it was a little bit expensive, but you get what you pay for

reviews.text: My wife and I chose to stay here for our 1st year wedding annivesary. This was actually our third choice but changed it twice due to reviews left on Trip Advisor about the other hotels....
reviews.title: A fantastic hotel for exploring central Prague!

likes.liked: — The friendliness and hospitality shown to our wedding party.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my husband are just back from a wonderful 4 day break in Prague. It was our first time there. I found the K&K Hotel on a Prague tourist website and checked out it's reviews here. The choice of hotels in Prague is overwhelming but we were more than pleased with our choice. The K&K is excellent value for a stay at a beautiful hotel. It is very clean and the staff are also lovely. We loved the buffet breakfast which is served until 11am and it has everything you could need, fresh food and all topped up regularly. It's also only a 3 min walk from the metro and in perfect location for the city. We would definitely come back to this hotel. Thank you for everything :-)
reviews.title: Will most definitely return

likes.disliked: — Bedroom and ensuite a little on the small side

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from 5 days in Prague and stayed at this hotel. It was satisfactory in every way: room, staff, breakfast, public area, location. Although the exterior and many decorative details of the public interior reflect the original age of the building and its Art Nouveau style, all the functional details and the rooms themselves are this century and well done. The staff is plentiful and helpful. The breakfast is well-prepared, varied and we loved the long hours. It worked when we caught an early train one morning to Kutne Hora and it worked when we wanted breakfast at 11 on Saturday. The price was quite reasonable for the amenities, although I realize it would be more expensive in the summer. Of course, everything else is as well which is why we travel in winter.
reviews.title: Very good choice

reviews.text: Beware that there is another Hotel Central around the corner from K&K. Rick Steves recommends it and it may be a perfectly lovely hotel but his recommendation is for the Hotel Central on Rybna St. The K & K Hotel Central is on Hybernska St. Our experience here was so good, we will give all other K& K hotels a try (Budapest, Vienna, etc.) if we get the chance.
reviews.title: Great hotel and Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Both hotels are terrically convenient to Stare Mesto (old town).
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel in a Fantastic City

reviews.text: I have just returned from a weekend trip in Prague and stayed in the K+K Central - the only comments that I have with regards to the hotel are positive. Brilliant location, excellent service, great breakfast and truly helpful staff. The bedrooms were very clean and tidy, the only negative may have been that the bathroom may have been slightly small. LCD tv with 3 English movie channels which was great when we wanted to rest after a day of walking before getting ready for dinner! Would highly recommend the "Original Needle house restaurant" across ths street for great food at a reasonable rate!! All in all a truly amazing city and a wonderful place to stay.
reviews.title: Clean rooms, convenient location, breakfast included...what more can I ask for?

description: A unique “Jugendstil” architecture adorns this stylish, top-quality hotel in Prague with a sophisticated and contemporary feel. The exceptional design and structure give this hotel in Prague its distinctive flair, while the extravagant interior invites you to relax and enjoy the uniquely opulent atmosphere. The hotel's location is first-class: right at the heart of Prague's historic Old Town, just a short distance from the Praná brána (Powder Tower). Free WiFi in all guest rooms and public area. Free access to the Internet Lounge (PCs, printer and international newspapers). Free access to the Wellness Area with gym and sauna. Complimentary coffee and tea making facilities in the rooms.
